name: Stanley

body:
### Say hello to Stanley
Stanley is a hecking DUMB Discord bot that's jam-packed with tons of useful* features, such as music playback, setting your username's color, rating waifus, tagging and returning images, sending memes, calculating Numberwang, and much more!

### Requesting features
If there's something you'd like to see added to Stanley, feel free to make a request on our [GitHub](https://github.com/dnaf/Stanley/issues) issue tracker.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
